common.beta_tooltip: Welcome to Raydium V3 ! Updates are ongoing. The V2 site can still be accessed <0>here</0>.
common.refresh_update: Refresh the page to update and use the app.

setting_board.slippage_tolerance_tooltip_swap: Set your slippage tolerance for swap transactions.
setting_board.slippage_tolerance_tooltip_liquidity: Set tolerance for changes in the quote/base token deposit ratio. This parameter improves transaction landing rate without increasing liquidity risk.
setting_board.slippage_tolerance_forerun: Your transaction may be frontrun and result in an unfavorable trade
setting_board.versioned_transaction_tooltip: Versioned Tx is a significant upgrade that allows for additional functionality, including advanced swap routing. Before turning on Vers. Tx, ensure that your wallet is compatible.
setting_board.transaction_priority_desc: The priority fee is paid to the Solana network. This additional fee helps boost how a transaction is prioritized against others, resulting in faster transaction execution times.
setting_board.transaction_priority_fee_tip: The priority fee is paid to the Solana network. This additional fee boosts transaction prioritization, resulting in faster execution times. Note that the fee is taken even if a transaction ultimately fails.
setting_board.transaction_priority_fee_usage: Fee settings are applied across all Raydium features, including Swap, Liquidity, and Staking.
setting_board.priority_fee_auto_optimizes: Raydium auto-optimizes priority fees for your transaction. Set a max cap to prevent overpaying.
setting_board.priority_fee_exact: Transactions will use the exact fee set below.
setting_board.priority_fee_below_market_rate: Your current max fee is below market rate. Increase it to ensure your transactions are processed.

wallet_connect_panel.auto_approve_tip_solflare: Auto-approve is now available for all transactions on Raydium.
wallet_connect_panel.phantom_wallet_not_installed: Oops... Looks like you donâ€™t have Phantom installed!

token_selector.search_placeholder: Search by token or paste address
token_selector.token_not_found: Canâ€™t find the token youâ€™re looking for? Try entering the mint address or check token list settings below.
token_selector.input_token_symbol: input a symbol for this token
token_selector.input_token_name: input a name for this token (optional)
token_selector.token_has_freeze: This token has freeze authority enabled and could prevent you from transferring or trading the token later.
token_selector.token_has_freeze_disable: The selected token has freeze authority enabled. Disable freeze authority and try again or choose a different token.

swap.title: Swap
swap.info_minimum_received_tooltip: The minimum number of tokens you will receive. This is determined by your slippage tolerance.
swap.info_maximum_input_tooltip: The maximum number of tokens you will input on this trade
swap.info_order_routing_tooltip: This route gave the best price for your trade
swap.info_price_impact_tooltip: The difference between the current market price and estimated price due to trade size
swap.info_estimated_fees_tooltip: Swap fees go to LPs, RAY buybacks, and treasury.
swap.info_not_default_token: This token is not on the default token lists.
swap.info_add_not_default_token: By clicking below, you understand that you are fully responsible for confirming the token you are trading.
swap.alert_price_updated_tooltip: Price has changed since your swap amount was entered.
swap.alert_high_price_warn_desc:
Price impact for this swap is {{percent}}
Confirming may result in a poor price for this swap!
swap.error_sol_fee_not_insufficient: You need at least {{amount}} SOL to pay for fees and deposits
swap.unwrap_wsol_info: You have {{amount}} WSOL that you can <sub>Unwrap</sub>
swap.blink_referral_desc: Copy your custom referral link and earn 1% rewards when it's used on Twitter with Blink!

liquidity.title: Liquidity
liquidity.APR_tooltip: Estimated APR based on trading fees earned by the pool in the past 24H
liquidity.stakeable_hint: You have unstaked LP tokens for this pool. You can stake them directly on the Stake Liquidity tab.
liquidity.auto_swap_hint: When auto-swap is on, token amounts will be automatically swapped to the deposit ratio needed to create your position.

auto_swap_modal.turn_on_description: When auto-swap is on, token amounts will be automatically swapped to the deposit ratio needed to create your position.
auto_swap_modal.turn_off_description: When auto-swap is off, tokens will not be swapped to match your position deposit ratio. You will need sufficient tokens in your wallet to create a position.

liquidity.pool_fee_desc: This is a {{feeRate}}% fee tier {{type}} liquidity pool
liquidity.no_active_farm: There is no active farm for this pool.
liquidity.want_to_stake_lp: Do you want to stake your LP now?
liquidity.stake_lp_desc: Stake LP tokens to a farm to earn additional rewards. You can also do it later under Portfolio.
liquidity.keep_my_position_open_tip: You can remove all your tokens and still keep your position open in order to  add position seamless next time.
liquidity.locked_positions_tip_info: You previously permanently locked the NFT for this position, however trading fees earned are still fully claimable.
liquidity.lock_desc1: Token teams can permanently lock liquidity. The NFT representing your position is sent to a locked token account. Fees will still be claimable.
liquidity.lock_desc2: To start, select a CLMM position below to lock. Ensure that <0>position value and NFT mint</0>  match the position you want to lock!
liquidity.lock_desc3: Note: Technically, your NFT is not burned but permanently locked.
liquidity.lock_desc4: Are you sure you want to <0>permanently</0> lock/burn liquidity? You will be unable to access or withdraw underlying position assets, only <1>trading fees earned will remain claimable</1>.
liquidity.lock_agree_text: By confirming below, I agree to permanently lock liquidity. I understand access to the underlying assets will be lost forever.
liquidity.lock_confirm_text: I confirm, permanently lock my liquidity forever
liquidity.lock_clmm_positions_empty: You do not currently have any open CLMM positions
liquidity.total_locked_position: Total locked liquidity in this pool: {{percent}}

create_pool.modal_section_header_pool_desc: Select pool type to create a pool for any token pair. Read the guide for <0>CLMM</0> or <1>Standard</1> pools.
create_pool.modal_section_header_farm_desc: Create a farm for any live pool. Read the instructions for <0>CLMM</0> or <1>Standard</1> farms.
create_pool.modal_section_header_lock_desc: Permanently burn/lock liquidity for an existing position. Trading fees remain claimable. <0>Learn more</0>
create_pool.clmm_please_note_des: This tool is for advanced users. For detailed instructions, read the guide for <0>CLMM</0> or <1>Standard</1> pools.
create_pool.clmm_create_pool_note_step2: Next, set initial token price & position price range
create_pool.clmm_create_pool_note_step3: Last, please enter token deposit amount
create_pool.clmm_create_pool_success_content: Your pool may take a few minutes before appearing in the pool list. Please kindly wait and refresh the page, and then search the pool list for your pool before attempting to create a farm.
create_pool.clmm_create_pool_fullrange_success_conte: Token creators can now burn/lock liquidity permanently while trading fees earned remain fully claimable.

clmm.match_deposit_ratio_tooltip: When turned on, token amounts will be automatically swapped to the deposit ratio needed to create your position
clmm.no_clmm_positions: You donâ€™t have any concentrated liquidity positions.
clmm.nft_desc: A new NFT representing your Concentrated Liquidity position is now in your wallet.
clmm.dont_burn_nft: <sub>DO NOT</sub> burn this NFT or you will be unable to remove liquidity! If you send the NFT to another wallet, only the new wallet will be able to remove liquidity.
clmm.input_lock_desc: The market price is outside your specified price range. Single asset deposit only.
clmm.price_away_from_market: Pool price is {{percent}} away from market
clmm.price_away_from_market_tooltip: The pool price is imbalanced for this pair. Adding a small amount of liquidity in a wide range can bring the price closer to the current market price.
clmm.low_liquidity_desc: Your deposit is large relative to current liquidity in the pool, which may lead to arbitrage on your position. If the quoted price is far from market price, this risk may be magnified.

migrate_clmm.title: Migrate to Concentrated Liquidity pool
migrate_clmm.desc: Migrate below or learn more about CLMM pools and risks
migrate_clmm.quick_migration_desc: Very wide price range for a more passive strategy.
migrate_clmm.custom_migration_desc: Set a custom price range for higher capital efficiency.

portfolio.section_positions_clmm_switch_direction_: Base/quote tokens have been switched to simplify data display.
portfolio.no_staked_farm: You donâ€™t have any staked RAY.
portfolio.no_standard_positions: You donâ€™t have any standard liquidity positions.
portfolio.acceleraytor_desc: You have unclaimed funds from AcceleRaytor. Remaining funds can be claimed below.
portfolio.acceleraytor_banner_desc: You have unclaimed funds in AcceleRaytor. Check details at the bottom of this page and claim funds with one click.

amm.pending_alert: You have unstaked LP tokens that could be staked in a farm. Stake now

staking.pending_rewards_tooltip: Pending rewards are calculated based on the current pool size and the time since the last harvest.
staking.staking_desc: Stake RAY to earn additional RAY yield.

error.decrease_reward: Decreasing the reward rate is permitted within 72 hours of current farm end time.

transaction.title: Transaction
transaction.multisig_wallet_desc: You can now cast votes for this proposal on the Squads app.

edit_farm.title: Edit Farm
edit_farm.please_note_content: You can add more tokens and/or extend the farming period. Any action that will decrease the reward rate can only be done within 72 hours of current farm end time, and the period must be extended by at least 7 days.
edit_farm.tour_note_des_1: 1. Rewards allocated to farms cannot be withdrawn after farming starts.
edit_farm.tour_note_des_2: 2. If you want to increase the reward rate, additional rewards can be added while a farm is still running. The period must be extended by at least 7 days.
edit_farm.tour_note_des_3: 3. If you want to decrease the rewards rate, this can only be done 72 hours before the end of the current farming period, and the period must be extended by at least 7 days.
edit_farm.title_des: Before creating a farm, make sure to check the

create_standard_pool.please_note_des: This tool is for advanced users. For detailed instructions, read the guide for <0>CLMM</0> or <1>Standard</1> pools.
create_standard_pool.note_has_id: OpenBook integrated pools must be linked to a unique OpenBook Market ID. A Market ID can only be used for one pool.
create_standard_pool.friendly_sentence_1: First, you need a Market ID
create_standard_pool.friendly_sentence_2:
Almost there! 
Now enter the initial pool settings
create_standard_pool.note_done: Your pool has been created successfully!
create_standard_pool.note_done_2: You can now create a farm or go back
create_standard_pool.market_create_orderbook: Create an OpenBook Market ID below:
create_standard_pool.market_min_order_size_tip: This is the smallest allowed order size.
create_standard_pool.market_price_tick_tip: This is the smallest amount by which prices can move.
create_standard_pool.market_advance_options_desc: Configure sizes for different accounts to adjust rent cost.
create_standard_pool.market_create_note: Note that creating a new market can cost anywhere from 3 - 4 SOL
create_standard_pool.pool_create_integrated_with_openbook: To create a pool that is integrated with an OpenBook market, click
create_standard_pool.initial_price_tooltip: Initial price is set by the ratio of tokens deposited for initial liquidity. If the token is already trading on Raydium, initial price will be auto-filled with the current price.
create_standard_pool.pool_creation_fee_note: Note: A creation fee ofÂ {{subject}}Â SOL is required for new pools.
create_standard_pool.pool_creation_fee_tooltip: A pool creation fee of 0.15 SOL is currently reserved to support front and backend infrastructure. Approximately 0.05 SOL is required for program account creation and network fees.
create_standard_pool.current_price_tooltip: This is the current price of an existing pool on Raydium. You can still enter a different initial price but be aware this may lead to arbitrage if the price difference is large.

create_farm.select_from_your_created_pools_tooltip: The farm will be created for the selected pool
create_farm.step_1_sentence: First, select a pool for farm rewards
create_farm.step_2_sentence: Next, enter rewards for the farm
create_farm.please_note_des: Rewards allocated to farms cannot be withdrawn after farming starts. Newly created farms generally appear on Raydium 10-30 minutes after creation, depending on Solana network status.
create_farm.note_des: A farm can be created for any pool that is already live. For detailed instructions, read the guide for <0>CLMM</0> or <1>Standard</1> farms.
create_farm.add_reward_token: You can add up to 3 reward tokens.

apr_dialog.desc: Two methods for calculating estimated APR are available, based on historical trade fees and emissions. Only positions in range earn yield. Past performance is not indicative of future results.
apr_dialog.warning_note: Calculations are an estimate and only for reference.
apr_dialog.mode_D_desc: This method uses the implied change (delta) in pool liquidity, as determined by the userâ€™s price range and position size, to calculate estimated APR.
apr_dialog.mode_D_desc_brief: Estimated APR is calculated by the Delta Method. Click the â€˜Dâ€™ icon to switch to the Multiplier Method or
apr_dialog.mode_M_desc: This method applies a multiplier, determined by the intersection of user price range and the historical price range of the pool, to calculate estimated APR.
apr_dialog.mode_M_desc_brief: Estimated APR is calculated by the Multiplier Method. Click the â€˜Mâ€™ icon to switch to the Delta Method or

moonpay.phantom_wallet_not_installed: Install Phantom and connect your wallet to log in.
moonpay.step2_text: Buy Solana with MoonPay to top up your trading account.
moonpay.step3_text: Buy & sell any token with one-click on Raydium.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text1: This website-hosted user interface (this "Interface") is an open source frontend software portal to the Raydium protocol, a decentralized and community-driven collection of blockchain-enabled smart contracts and tools (the "Raydium Protocol"). This Interface and the Raydium Protocol are made available by the Raydium Holding Foundation, however all transactions conducted on the protocol are run by related permissionless smart contracts. As the Interface is open-sourced and the Raydium Protocol and its related smart contracts are accessible by any user, entity or third party, there are a number of third party web and mobile user-interfaces that allow for interaction with the Raydium Protocol.
disclaimer.text2: THIS INTERFACE AND THE RAYDIUM PROTOCOL ARE PROVIDED "AS IS", AT YOUR OWN RISK, AND WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND. The Raydium Holding Foundation does not provide, own, or control the Raydium Protocol or any transactions conducted on the protocol or via related smart contracts. By using or accessing this Interface or the Raydium Protocol and related smart contracts, you agree that no developer or entity involved in creating, deploying or maintaining this Interface or the Raydium Protocol will be liable for any claims or damages whatsoever associated with your use, inability to use, or your interaction with other users of, this Interface or the Raydium Protocol, including any direct, indirect, incidental, special, exemplary, punitive or consequential damages, or loss of profits, digital assets, tokens, or anything else of value.
disclaimer.text3: The Raydium Protocol is not available to residents of Belarus, the Central African Republic, The Democratic Republic of Congo, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the Crimea, Donetsk People's Republic, and Luhansk People's Republic regions of Ukraine, Cuba, Iran, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, South Sudan, Syria, the USA, Yemen, Zimbabwe and any other jurisdiction in which accessing or using the Raydium Protocol is prohibited (the "Prohibited Jurisdictions").
disclaimer.text4: By using or accessing this Interface, the Raydium Protocol, or related smart contracts, you represent that you are not located in, incorporated or established in, or a citizen or resident of the Prohibited Jurisdictions. You also represent that you are not subject to sanctions or otherwise designated on any list of prohibited or restricted parties or excluded or denied persons, including but not limited to the lists maintained by the United States' Department of Treasury's Office of Foreign Assets Control, the United Nations Security Council, the European Union or its Member States, or any other government authority.
